A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went to see an epic Luke Skywalker moment that will get me thrilled\, want to be a jedi. Want to relive the moment of wonder when i first saw SW. Instead i've seen the worst SW movie of all time in terms of story and the plot. Visually and technically this movie was very well made but it fell short on many points. This movie has more plot holes than any other movie i've seen.
